Room.Name: West Tower
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Western Tower, home to Elise, the youngest mage in Mordor.
Room.LongDescription: Elise is one of the most powerful mages perhaps in the world. It is quite puzzling that such a young woman is already a White Moon and a Preserver Wizard, the highest rank that can be achieved. The Order of the White Moon is an elven sorority of lawful, good wizards whose ranks are limited only to those who have proven their skill and devotion to goodness. Any wizard may petition to enter, as the sorority is not limited to elves nor females. The Order of the White Moon is a powerful ally of the Red-Robed wizards in the City of Oceancrest.
